title: Cryptocurrency: Legalities, Storing and Mining
headline: Master the legalities around cryptocurrencies, and understand how to successfully mine and safely store them.
description: This free online course introduces you to the legal issues surrounding cryptocurrencies in the world. It gives you useful insights into how best to store digital currencies as well as how to go about getting involved with cryptocurrency mining and the anonymity of the technology behind it. As cryptocurrencies emerge into mainstream life, this is important knowledge to have so you can mine and store your crypto securely.
courseDescription:
This free cryptocurrency course begins with a look at the legal situation of cryptocurrencies, both in the UK and around the world. You will learn how they are treated for tax purposes and how governments may begin to impose further regulations on their use as digital currencies become more widespread and mainstream. You will then study using and storing cryptocurrency, from making payments to the basics of investing, looking at the various types of wallets to store your coins and exploring how to find a reputable exchange.

The material then moves on to discuss cryptocurrency mining; find out how to get involved and what computer hardware and software is required. Finally, the course dives into the anonymity of cryptocurrency. This is one of the biggest selling points of digital currencies to people who are worried about keeping themselves safe and secure online, and you will learn about the benefits and drawbacks of being anonymous. Furthermore, look at some currencies that were developed specifically with higher levels of anonymity in mind.

This free course includes a number of optional activities to help further your studies and revision. It will give you a strong understanding of the legalities of cryptocurrencies, as well as a basic knowledge of mining digital currencies and storing your coins securely. With cryptocurrency becoming ever more popular, understanding its complexities has never been more important.
